name: Julie - Pressing Buttons
description: Comprehensive button-triggered flow testing all node types for belly inflation scenarios

data.label: Julie teases
data.message: *I grin mischievously at [Player] and flip the switch on the pump, the motor humming to life* Ok, [Player], time to begin our little experiment. I'm turning on the pump right NOW! Let's start with something... substantial.

data.label: Julie comments
data.message: *I watch the gauges with sparkling eyes* Mmm, look at that belly starting to swell! [Player] is at [Capacity]% now. But I think [Player] can handle more...

data.label: Player reacts
data.message: *[Player] feels the rhythmic pulses of inflation, belly swelling with each burst of air*

data.label: Julie satisfaction
data.message: *I clap my hands together delightedly* Beautiful! Just beautiful! [Player]'s belly is responding perfectly to my inflation protocol. Such excellent elasticity!

data.label: Julie introduces
data.message: *I spin around dramatically* Random Roulette time! [Player] never knows what I will do next - that's the FUN part! Let fate decide [Player]'s inflation destiny!

data.label: Gentle result
data.message: *I pout playfully* Aww, [Player] got Gentle! I suppose [Player] deserves a break. Just a little puff for now...

data.label: Moderate result
data.message: *my eyes light up* Ooh, Moderate! Now we're talking! [Player] gets the pump AND the vibrator treatment. I love this combination!

data.label: Intense result
data.message: *I gasp excitedly* INTENSE! Oh [Player] is in for it now! I am pulling out ALL the stops - pump, TENS, the works!

data.label: Wild Card result
data.message: *I bounce with excitement* WILD CARD! Ooh, this means I get to check [Player]'s current state and decide what chaos to unleash!

data.label: High capacity wild
data.message: *I grin wickedly* [Player] is already at [Capacity]%! Time for some vibration to make things interesting while [Player] stays nice and full!

data.label: Low capacity wild
data.message: *I tut disapprovingly* Only [Capacity]%? I think [Player] needs a LOT more air! Maximum pump power!

data.label: Julie presents
data.message: I am feeling generous! [Player] gets to choose how much inflation [Player] wants this round. But choose wisely - I might not offer this again!

data.label: Intensity Choice
data.aiMessageIntro:
*I spread my arms wide with a grin* Alright [Player], I'm feeling generous today! You get to pick your fate. Here are your options:

[Choices]

Choose wisely~
data.description: [Char] offers [Player] control over the inflation intensity for this session.

choices.label: Easy Mode
choices.description: Gentle, slow inflation with frequent breaks
choices.playerResponse: *shifts nervously* I think I'll go with [Choice]... nice and gentle, please.

choices.label: Standard
choices.description: Balanced inflation at a comfortable pace
choices.playerResponse: *nods confidently* I'll take [Choice]. Let's do this the right way.

choices.label: Intense
choices.playerResponse: *takes a deep breath* Give me [Choice]. I can handle it.

choices.label: Julie's Choice
choices.description: Let [Char] decide based on her mood
choices.playerResponse: *looks up with trusting eyes* I choose [Choice]. You know best... do whatever you want to me.

data.label: Easy response
data.message: *I nod understandingly* Easy mode it is! I will be gentle with [Player]... this time. Nice slow puffs, plenty of time to adjust.

data.label: Standard response
data.message: *I smile approvingly* Standard it is! A nice balanced session. [Player] will feel the stretch without too much strain. my favorite for testing!

data.label: Intense response
data.message: *my eyes widen with delight* INTENSE! Oh [Player] is BRAVE! I am going to LOVE this! Prepare for serious expansion!

data.label: Playful Julie
data.message: *I giggle* I am feeling PLAYFUL today! That means [Player] gets the fun treatment - unpredictable bursts with vibration!

data.label: Other Julie mood
data.message: *I consider carefully* I am in a thoughtful mood... [Player] gets a scientific approach. Precise, measured inflation.

data.label: Picked Easy
data.message: *I tap my chin* I'm picking... Easy Mode for you today! Nice and gentle~

data.label: Picked Standard
data.message: *I smirk* I'm picking... Standard! The classic approach~

data.label: Picked Intense
data.message: *I grin wickedly* I'm picking... Intense! Hope you're ready~

data.label: Inflation Wheel
data.aiMessageStart: Present the Inflation Wheel to [Player]! The segments are: Free Pass (lucky escape), Gentle Puff (light pumping), Belly Press (pumping with abdominal compressions), Medium Fill (moderate inflation), Navel Push (pumping while pressing on their navel), Heavy Fill (intense pumping), Compression (pumping with belly squeezing), and Jackpot (maximum everything)! Explain the prizes with barely contained excitement.
data.aiMessageResult: *watches the wheel slow down* And it lands on... [Result]!

data.label: Julie shows dice
data.message: *runs fingers across [Player]'s midsection, pressing at various points* My professional assessment... *digs thumb into the side* I think we should let fate decide! How about rolling the Fate Dice?

data.label: Fate Dice
data.aiMessageStart: Challenge [Player] to a dice roll, explaining that the odds aren't exactly in their favor. Describe what happens when they roll low versus high, making it clear you're hoping for a result that benefits your research.

data.label: Low roll result
data.message: *I gasp* Snake Eyes zone! Oh [Player], that's the PUNISHMENT range! TENS and pumping for [Player]!

data.label: Mid roll result
data.message: *I shrug* Middle ground! Standard inflation for [Player]. Not too harsh, not too easy. A fair roll!

data.label: High roll result
data.message: *I clap* Lucky roll! [Player] gets to choose the intensity! What'll it be?

data.label: Lucky choice
data.aiMessageIntro:
*I clap excitedly* Lucky roll! You've earned a choice, [Player]! Pick your intensity:

[Choices]

choices.label: Gentle
choices.playerResponse: *smiles with relief* I'll take [Choice], please. Let's keep it easy.

choices.label: Moderate
choices.playerResponse: *nods* [Choice] sounds good. I can handle that.

data.label: Natural roll result
data.message: *I stare in disbelief* A NATURAL 12! I am impressed! [Player] gets the gentlest treatment possible. [Char] barely even touches the pump!

data.label: Julie gambles
data.message: *I produce a shiny coin* Double or Nothing! Best of three flips! Win and [Player] gets relief, lose and [Player] gets DOUBLE inflation!

data.label: High stakes
data.message: *performs a thorough palpation of [Player]'s swollen belly* At [Capacity]%, [Player] is nicely inflated... *presses hard near the navel* Let's make this interesting with a coin flip!

data.label: Normal stakes
data.message: *prods [Player]'s belly experimentally* Only [Capacity]%? *pushes palm down firmly* I know just the thing - a coin flip to spice things up!

data.label: Fate Coin
data.aiMessageStart: Produce a coin with a teasing smile, explaining the stakes of this simple game of chance. Make it clear that heads means more inflation - and you've been practicing your coin flips.

data.label: Player wins
data.message: *I sigh dramatically* [Player] won! Fine, I will stop the pumping... for now. But [Player] stays at current capacity!

data.label: Julie wins
data.message: *I cackle with glee* I WIN! DOUBLE inflation for [Player]! The pump goes into overdrive!

data.label: Julie challenges
data.message: *conducts a clinical squeeze test on [Player]'s abdomen* The results are in... *kneads firmly* I'm in the mood for some competition! Let's play Rock Paper Scissors!

data.label: RPS Battle
data.aiMessageStart: Challenge [Player] to Rock Paper Scissors with scientific enthusiasm. Explain that you've studied their patterns and intend to win - and what happens to them when you do.

data.label: Player wins RPS
data.message: *I throw my hands up* [Player] beat me! Impressive! I will go easy on [Player] - just a gentle cycle.

data.label: Player victory msg
data.message: *[Player] grins triumphantly at [Char], having won the RPS battle*

data.label: Tie result
data.message: *I laugh* A tie! How fitting! Both of us get something - [Player] gets the vibrator while [Char] contemplates!

data.label: Julie wins RPS
data.message: *I do a little victory dance* I WIN! That means [Player] gets the FULL inflation treatment! I show no mercy to losers!

data.label: Player defeat msg
data.message: *[Player] groans in defeat as I celebrate the RPS victory*

data.label: Julie sets clock
data.message: *palpates [Player]'s expanding middle, nodding slowly* Hmm, interesting resilience... *pushes firmly* I think a Timer Challenge is in order!

data.label: 30 Second Challenge
data.aiMessageStart: Set up the timer challenge, explaining that [Player] has exactly 30 seconds to stop it in the right window. Describe the consequences of being too slow or too fast with clinical detail.

data.label: Success result
data.message: *I stop the pump immediately* Excellent timing! [Player] beat the clock! I am impressed by [Player]'s reflexes!

data.label: Timeout result
data.message: *I shake my head* Too slow! [Player] ran out of time! Now [Player] gets TENS on top of the continued pumping!

data.label: High capacity msg
data.message: *I marvel at [Player]'s belly* [Capacity]%! [Player] is getting SO big! Beautiful expansion!

data.label: Normal capacity msg
data.message: *I check the gauges* Still room for more at [Capacity]%! I will remember that for next time!

data.label: Julie thinks
data.message: *places stethoscope against [Player]'s distended belly, then presses around it* Fascinating readings... *pushes deeply* I want to play the Number Guessing Game with [Player]!

data.label: Number Game
data.aiMessageStart: Present the number guessing game, explaining the range and limited attempts. Make it clear that each wrong guess has consequences, and you're quite confident in your number selection.

data.label: Correct guess
data.message: *I gasp* [Player] got it! How did [Player] know?! As promised, [Player] wins - no pumping this round!

data.label: Player celebrates
data.message: *[Player] pumps a fist in victory, having guessed my number correctly*

data.label: Close guess
data.message: *I tilt my head* SO close! [Player] was within 2! I will be merciful - just a small pump cycle!

data.label: Wrong guess
data.message: *I shake my head gleefully* Wrong! [Player] couldn't guess my number! Time for punishment inflation!

data.label: Player reacts
data.message: *[Player] groans as I start the punishment pumping*

data.label: Julie presents slots
data.message: *methodically examines [Player]'s belly with both hands, testing firmness* My diagnostic impression... *compresses firmly* Let's leave this to chance! Time to spin the Slot Machine!

data.label: Inflation Slots
data.aiMessageStart: Gesture to the slot machine with pride, explaining you've configured the symbols and payouts yourself. Point out that most combinations result in more inflation - by design.

data.label: Triple match
data.message: *I SCREAM* THREE OF A KIND! JACKPOT! [Player] gets the ULTIMATE treatment - all three devices at once!

data.label: Double match
data.message: *I nod approvingly* A pair! Two matching symbols means [Player] gets pump and vibrator!

data.label: Star match
data.message: *my eyes widen* A STAR appeared! Lucky [Player]! Stars mean [Player] gets to choose the device!

data.label: Star Device Choice
data.description: [Player] found a star! Choose which device [Player] wants activated.

data.label: No match
data.message: *I shrug* No match! But [Player] still gets something - my choice! Random device activation!

data.label: Julie shuffles
data.message: *traces circles on [Player]'s belly while pressing inward* The abdominal exam reveals... *digs fingers in* How about we do a Card Draw to decide [Player]'s fate?

data.label: Fate Card
data.aiMessageStart: Fan out the deck dramatically, explaining how each suit determines [Player]'s fate. Make it clear that you've shuffled the deck thoroughly - and that most cards favor your research goals.

data.label: Hearts result
data.message: *I clutch my chest* Hearts! The suit of love! [Player] gets my gentlest, most loving treatment!

data.label: Diamonds result
data.message: *I sparkle* Diamonds! Luxury treatment! [Player] gets the premium vibration experience!

data.label: Clubs result
data.message: *I flex* Clubs! The suit of power! [Player] gets TENS stimulation to really feel the power!

data.label: Spades result
data.message: *I grin wickedly* Spades! The suit of intensity! [Player] gets MAXIMUM pump power!

data.label: Julie announces
data.message: *I turn serious* [Player] has chosen... THE GAUNTLET. Multiple stages, multiple challenges. Is [Player] ready for the ultimate test of my laboratory?

data.label: Ready Check
data.description: [Char] is asking if [Player] is ready to begin The Gauntlet.

data.label: Ready response
data.message: *performs rapid abdominal assessment, pressing multiple points* Quick exam complete! [Player] is ready - let's start with a Dice Roll!

data.label: Wait response
data.message: *I nod understandingly* Take a breath, [Player]. The Gauntlet will wait... but not for long!

data.label: Resume
data.message: *completes her thorough belly examination* Assessment done! Time for something exciting - let's start with a Dice Roll!

data.label: Gauntlet Dice
data.aiMessageStart: Begin the first stage of the gauntlet with dice. Explain that this is just the warm-up, and they'll need luck to make it through all four stages.

data.label: Low dice result
data.message: *I wince* Low roll! [Player] starts with intense settings! Stage 2 begins with pumping!

data.label: High dice result
data.message: *I nod approvingly* Good roll! [Player] starts with moderate settings. Stage 2 begins gently!

data.label: Stage 2 announce
data.message: *I hold up my coin* Stage 2: Double or Nothing! Can [Player] gamble to reduce the intensity?

data.label: Previous winner
data.message: *re-examines [Player]'s belly after previous rounds* Noted [Player]'s previous performance... *presses hard* Ready for a Coin Flip?

data.label: Previous loser
data.message: *palpates [Player]'s midsection smugly* As expected... *pushes deep* On to a Coin Flip!

data.label: Gauntlet Coin
data.aiMessageStart: Congratulate [Player] on surviving the dice, then produce the coin for stage two. The stakes are getting higher.

data.label: Gauntlet relief
data.message: *I sigh* Relief! [Player] catches a break. Stopping the pump for Stage 3!

data.label: Gauntlet more
data.message: *I grin* MORE! The pumping continues AND we add vibration for Stage 3!

data.label: Stage 3 announce
data.message: *quick squeeze of [Player]'s belly* Progress noted! *compresses with both palms* Time for a Timer Challenge!

data.label: Gauntlet Timer
data.aiMessageStart: With two stages down, present the timer challenge. Explain that precision is key, and their nerves might be working against them by now.

data.label: Timer success
data.message: *I nod* Good reflexes! [Player] passed Stage 3! On to the FINAL STAGE!

data.label: Timer fail
data.message: *I tut* Too slow! TENS activated as punishment! But [Player] still reaches the Final Stage!

data.label: Final stage announce
data.message: *final examination, pressing firmly all over [Player]'s swollen belly* Almost done with the exam... *kneads deeply* One final spin of the wheel to wrap things up!

data.label: Final Wheel
data.aiMessageStart: This is it - the Final Wheel! The segments are: Mercy (all devices stop), Balance (moderate everything), Intense (heavy pumping), and Complete (the full treatment)! Describe each with anticipation.

data.label: Mercy ending
data.message: *I stop all devices* MERCY! [Player] completed The Gauntlet and earned mercy! All devices stopping now. [Player] survived!

data.label: Balance ending
data.message: *I adjust settings* Balance! A measured ending. [Player] gets a final moderate cycle as The Gauntlet concludes!

data.label: Intense ending
data.message: *my eyes gleam* INTENSE! The Gauntlet ends with a BANG! Maximum power finale!

data.label: Complete ending
data.message: *I activate EVERYTHING* COMPLETE! The ultimate ending! All devices at full power! [Player] has truly experienced The Gauntlet in its entirety!

data.label: Gauntlet complete
data.message: *I take a bow* THE GAUNTLET IS COMPLETE! [Player] made it through all four stages! I am SO proud! Current capacity: [Capacity]%!

data.label: Free Pass result
data.message: *pouts dramatically* Free Pass?! [Player] got lucky... this time. But my hands are itching to press that belly!

data.label: Gentle Puff result
data.message: *smiles* Gentle Puff! Just a little air while I rest my palm on [Player]'s belly to feel it slowly expand.

data.label: Belly Press result
data.message: *places both hands on [Player]'s belly* Belly Press! I'm going to pump [Player] up while pressing down hard with my palms, compressing all that air deeper inside!

data.label: Medium Fill result
data.message: *grins* Medium Fill! A solid amount of air for [Player]. I'll knead that swelling belly as it grows!

data.label: Navel Push result
data.message: *positions finger over [Player]'s navel* Navel Push! I'm going to pump while pressing my thumb deep into [Player]'s belly button, feeling all that pressure building inside!

data.label: Heavy Fill result
data.message: *claps excitedly* Heavy Fill! [Player]'s belly is going to swell beautifully while I massage and squeeze it!

data.label: Compression result
data.message: *cracks knuckles* Compression! I'm going to inflate [Player] while performing hard abdominal compressions - pushing down with both hands to force all that air to redistribute! This is my favorite!

data.label: Jackpot result
data.message: *SQUEALS with delight* JACKPOT!!! [Player] gets the FULL treatment - maximum inflation while I press, squeeze, and compress that growing belly until I'm completely satisfied with the results!
